Pre-Game Insights: The Washington Wizards finished 15-67 overall last season while going 7-34 at home. The Wizards allowed opponents to score 123.0 points per game and shoot 49.6% from the field last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Golden State Warriors averaged 16.2 points off of turnovers, 15.7 second-chance points and 42.6 bench points last season.
Others: Saddiq Bey: out (knee), Malcolm Brogdon: out (thumb), Kyle Kuzma: out (groin) for the Washington Wizards
Stephen Curry: day to day (ankle), De'Anthony Melton: day to day (facet) for the Golden State Warriors
